description:
Uesugi Kenshin and Takeda Shingen are rivals.  The two of them are battling again today like always, and seem to be enjoying themselves. Both have pieces of the armor, but neither will simply hand it over. Mitsuhide suggests a plan to trick them both and get the armor, but Nobunaga refuses, not wanting to ruin their fight.  Meanwhile, Hideyoshi is depressed that her cell phone is broken...
Source: crunchyroll
